Tina Sutherland

GitHub

About Me

I am a versatile and innovative artist who obtained my Bachelor of Fine Arts Degree from the Ontario College of Art and Design. Amoungst Painting , Drawing and Graphic Design I also created three dimentional art pieces with the use of metal, wood and plastics. Born in Trinidad and keeping with my roots, I am also the founder and designer of my own line of steel pansticks and souvenir products by the name of 'Cool Sticks'. I currently work for Service Ontario in the customer care department as well as manage a resturant part-time. I am also recently seperated and raising an amazing 5 year old boy mostly on my own. I am excited about this new venture in life and hope to go far with my newly obtained Knowledge in web development.
